# Venue {#sec-venue}

```{r warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(warning = FALSE, message = FALSE)
library(dplyr,warn.conflicts = FALSE)
library(leaflet,warn.conflicts = FALSE)
library(leaflet.extras)
library(htmltools,warn.conflicts = FALSE)

content <- paste(sep = "<br/>",
  "<b><a href='https://www.google.co.uk/maps/dir//Nexus+-+University+of+Leeds,+Discovery+Way,+Leeds+LS2+3AA/@53.8052821,-1.5502785,15z/data=!4m9!4m8!1m0!1m5!1m1!1s0x48795c028b513609:0x6014fd660699c8ee!2m2!1d-1.5502785!2d53.8052821!3e0' target='_blank'>Nexus</a></b>",
  "Discovery Way",
  "University of Leeds",
  "Leeds, LS2 3AA"
)

leaflet() %>% setView(-1.550028, 53.805251, zoom = 15) %>% addTiles() %>% addResetMapButton() %>%
  addPopups(lng=-1.550028, lat=53.805251, content,
    options = popupOptions(closeButton = FALSE, autoClose = FALSE, closeOnClick = FALSE)
  )
```
